MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: The jWorkSheet is a time tracker application
English.Char_Desc_80: The jWorkSheet is a desktop time tracker application for your projects.
English.Char_Desc_250: The jWorkSheet is a personal desktop time tracker application for your projects, data are presented in a spreadsheet like format. Users can to create your own user reports by XSL transformations.
English.Char_Desc_450:
The jWorkSheet is a personal desktop time tracker application for your projects, data are presented in a spreadsheet like format. Users can to create your own user reports by XSL transformations.
The Best Features: * application is designed for an easy modification of your data include time information * user defined HTML reports are supported * two level resolution is available for a spend time (project - tasks)
English.Char_Desc_2000:
The jWorkSheet is a personal desktop time tracker application for your projects, data are presented in a spreadsheet like format. Users can to create your own user reports by XSL transformations.
The Best Features: * application is designed for an easy modification of your data include time information * user defined HTML reports are supported * two level resolution is available for a spend time (project - tasks) * System Tray is supported (on Java 6+) * business informations are saved by a XML format in a user subdirectory * short Flash presentation is ready for your quick start * size of the application is 180 kB only * application is based on a unique technology UJO Framework * independence on a operating system, a Java SE 5.0+ is required only

Permissions.EULA: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE, Version 2, June 1991
